children.text: The page was manually generated and audio clips were chosen to compare: "The Monster Mash: Everything you Didn't Know" (2024) by the Too Much Information (TMI) Podcast, and "How Monster Mash Became the Ultimate Halloween Smash" by iHeart Radio (2020). The comparison of audios presents a different form of comparative analysis through listening.

The two audios compared here are podcasts that cover the history of the "Monster Mash". The first podcast by the TMI Podcast features Alex Heigl and Jordan Runtagh. The annotations are of Heigl and Runtagh’s conversation and the central themes of Boris Pickett’s personal life, career trajectory, influences, horror culture, and the song’s production and origin. This will be compared to the podcast by iHeart Radio's Steve Greenberg. The annotations explore the song's history and key insights, including lyrical analysis, cultural themes of horror, and the song's broader impact. Both podcasts present the story of the "Monster Mash" in similar and different ways– which will be further explored through comparative analysis.

title: Comparison clips - multiple audio events + annotations
